package.name: lego_mcp_realtime
package.description:
Real-time determinism and PTP synchronization for LEGO MCP.
Features: - IEEE 1588 PTP time synchronization - Real-time scheduling and priority management - WCET analysis support - Deterministic execution guarantees - Clock synchronization across distributed nodes
Reference Standards: - IEEE 1588-2019 (Precision Time Protocol) - IEC 61784-2 (Industrial Ethernet) - POSIX 1003.1b Real-Time Extensions
